othermeta.name: shortdesc
othermeta.content: Describes how to compose and send system email notifications, manage recipients and delivery targets.

ul.li: Mail merge is configured for the form. For additional information, refer to Configuring Mail Merge.
Mail body templates are available in the Mail Body Templates catalog of the library. For additional information, refer to Creating Mail Body Templates.
You must be invited to the project and assigned with the View permission.

body.context: You can send email notifications after configuring Mail Merge for the form. The mail merge documentis sent as an attachment.

li.p: On the required list page, select the records the details of which must be sent to recipients.
Click Mail Merge, and then click Merge and Email.
The Merge and Email dialog box is displayed.
In the Recipient(s) box, perform the following steps to select email recipients:
Click List to select the required recipients.
The Recipients dialog box is displayed.
The dialog box lists all the users of the application. For information on user accounts, refer to Creating a User Account.
Select the required recipients, and then click Select.
Alternatively, you can enter the email addresses of the recipients. You can enter multiple email addresses separated by a semicolon (;).
From the Mail Merge Configuration drop-down list, select the required configuration.
The available options are all the mail merge configurations associated with the form. For information on mail merge configurations, refer to Configuring Mail Merge.
From the Mail Body Template drop-down list, select the required template.
Available options are mail body templates defined in the Mail Body Templates catalog of the library.
For additional information, refer to Creating Mail Body Templates.

To send the mail merge document in PDF format, select the Convert to PDF check box to convert the mail merge document to PDF. If the check box is cleared, then the mail merge document is sent in the Word format.

p.note: If the Convert to PDF check box is selected at the time mail merge is configured, then this check box is selected by default. Clear the check box if conversion of the mail merge document to PDF is not required.

li.p: The email with the mail merge document as attachment is sent to the selected recipients. If multiple records are selected, then separate emails for each record is sent to the recipients.
